name: MedicationUseStopTypeCodeLijst_to_MedicationStatementStatus
title: MedicationUseStopTypeCodeLijst to MedicationStatementStatus
description: Maps MedicationUseStopType codes as found in Dutch [zib ('Zorginformatiebouwsteen', i.e. Health and Care Information Model) MedicationUse2-v1.1.1(2020EN)](https://zibs.nl/wiki/MedicationUse2-v1.1.1(2020EN)) to `MedicationStatement.status` codes as found in FHIR R4.
